description: Generates actionable tasks with title, short description, priority level, and estimated time based on approved summary

tasks.title: string
tasks.description: string

tasks.title: Review full-stack development concepts
tasks.description: Study the fundamentals of full-stack development, focusing on React (frontend) and Node.js (backend) to prepare for the project.

tasks.title: Design database schema for MongoDB integration
tasks.description: Plan and document the database structure to support user authentication and app data, ensuring seamless integration with MongoDB.

tasks.title: Set up RESTful API using Node.js
tasks.description: Develop the backend API endpoints to handle requests between frontend and database, implementing CRUD operations as required.

tasks.title: Implement user authentication system
tasks.description: Build secure authentication with signup, login, and protected routes, utilizing industry-standard best practices.

tasks.title: Develop responsive UI in React
tasks.description: Create a user interface with React that adapts to various devices and screen sizes, ensuring a smooth user experience.

tasks.title: Test full app functionality
tasks.description: Verify that authentication, API, and database integration function as expected. Address bugs and edge cases.

tasks.title: Deploy web app to cloud platform
tasks.description: Set up and configure deployment to a cloud service (e.g., Heroku, AWS, or Vercel) ensuring environment variables and production readiness.

tasks.title: Document the project and setup steps
tasks.description: Write clear documentation for setup, usage, and features, including authentication and deployment instructions.

tasks.title: Review Computer Science project requirements
tasks.description: Double-check that the web app meets all computer science project specifications and prepare it for the March 15th deadline.

tasks.title: Study for Data Structures exam
tasks.description: Allocate focused study time to prepare for the Data Structures exam on March 20th.
